INSERT INTO cloud_sync_incre_db.eci_detection_report( detectionReportId, emrId, patientId, patientNo, patientIdno, patientAddress, patientMobile, patientSex, outPatientFlag, hospitalId, detectionTypeId, detectionChildTypeId, rawDetectionTypeId, rawDetectionChildTypeId, detectionTypeName, deptId, deptName, diagnosis, sampleNo, sampleName, sampleType, sampleState, instrument, applyDoctorId, applyDoctorNo, applyDoctorName, operateDoctorId, operateDoctorNo, operateDoctorName, reportDoctorId, reportDoctorNo, reportDoctorName, auditDoctorId, auditDoctorNo, auditDoctorName, remark, applyTime, sampleTime, acceptTime, reportTime, state, readFlag, createTime, updateTime, patientUuid, applyDoctorUuid, syncTime, deptUuid , operateDoctorUuid, reportDoctorUuid, auditDoctorUuid, rawCreateTime, inhospitaltimes )VALUES( #{detectionReportId}, #{emrId}, #{patientId}, #{patientNo}, #{patientIdno}, #{patientAddress}, #{patientMobile}, #{patientSex}, #{outPatientFlag}, #{hospitalId}, #{detectionTypeId}, #{detectionChildTypeId}, #{rawDetectionTypeId}, #{rawDetectionChildTypeId}, #{detectionTypeName}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{diagnosis}, #{sampleNo}, #{sampleName}, #{sampleType}, #{sampleState}, #{instrument}, #{applyDoctorId}, #{applyDoctorNo}, #{applyDoctorName}, #{operateDoctorId}, #{operateDoctorNo}, #{operateDoctorName}, #{reportDoctorId}, #{reportDoctorNo}, #{reportDoctorName}, #{auditDoctorId}, #{auditDoctorNo}, #{auditDoctorName}, #{remark}, #{applyTime}, #{sampleTime}, #{acceptTime}, #{reportTime}, #{state}, #{readFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{patientUuid}, #{applyDoctorUuid}, NOW(),
#{deptUuid}, #{operateDoctorUuid}, #{reportDoctorUuid}, #{auditDoctorUuid}, #{rawCreateTime}, #{inhospitaltimes} )
